articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Any ‘military misadventure’ by India will be met with ‘swift, resolute response’: Pak Army chief - The Tribune
articles.description: His remark comes amid heightened tension between India and Pakistan after the Pahalgam terror attack and Islamabad's apprehension of retaliatory action by New Delhi.
articles.content: Pakistan Army chief Gen Asim Munir on Thursday warned that any "military misadventure" by India will be met with a "swift, resolute and notch-up response" as he visited a firing range to witness a hi… [+1586 chars]
